docs.lead_paragraph: Eager to share Bernie Sanders's claim to the grass roots, Hillary Clinton is having trouble owning up to the deep pockets helping her campaign. For his part, Sanders is struggling to make a convincing case that the numbers add up in his hugely expensive health plan.

headline.main: AP FACT CHECK: Dems Offer Iffy Stats on Donors, Health Plan
headline.print_headline: AP FACT CHECK: Dems Offer Iffy Stats on Donors, Health Plan

docs.snippet: Eager to share Bernie Sanders's claim to the grass roots, Hillary Clinton is having trouble owning up to the deep pockets helping her campaign. For his part, Sanders is struggling to make a convincing case that the numbers add up in his hugely...

docs.lead_paragraph: Researchers say people with at least a high school education and healthier lifestyles are aiding a decline in new cases, or staving off dementia longer.

headline.main: Education May Cut Dementia Risk, Study Finds
headline.print_headline: Education and Healthy Lifestyle Can Help Stop or Slow Dementia, Study Says

docs.abstract: Study in The New England Journal of Medicine concludes improvements to education, lifestyle and health are contributing to decline in overall number of new cases of dementia.
docs.snippet: Researchers say people with at least a high school education and healthier lifestyles are aiding a decline in new cases, or staving off dementia longer.
